prompts: Create a psychic-type Pokemon that looks fluffy and has large, expressive ears.
Imagine a small, cute Pokemon that has big blue eyes and a unique tail design.
Design a Pokemon that embodies a mixture of innocence and mysterious charm.
Show me a playful creature that can blend into urban environments with its subtle colors.
Give me a whimsical Pokemon that captures the essence of softness and gentleness.
Generate an adorable psychic Pokemon with a round body and a curious demeanor.
Make a Pokemon that can be found in serene forest habitats, showcasing its gentle nature.
